CustomField.description: Utilization percentage considering travel as utilized time
CustomField.formula: IF(( Total_Regular_Working_Time_In_Mins__c + Total_Extended_Working_Time_In_Mins__c - Total_Non_Working_Time_In_Mins_Before__c ) = 0, 0, ( Scheduled_Task_Duration_After__c + Total_Travel_Time_After__c ) / (Total_Regular_Working_Time_In_Mins__c + Total_Extended_Working_Time_In_Mins__c - Total_Non_Working_Time_In_Mins_Before__c ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Utilization percentage considering travel as utilized time
CustomField.label: Utilization Incl Travel After
